solution_line_template: First add up the calories from all three meals: {lunch_calories} + {breakfast_calories} + {dinner_calories} = <<{lunch_calories}+{breakfast_calories}+{dinner_calories}={total_calories_eaten}>>{total_calories_eaten}

Then subtract Jacob's goal from the number of calories he actually ate: {total_calories_eaten} - {planned_calories_per_day} = <<{total_calories_eaten}-{planned_calories_per_day}={calories_over_planned}>>{calories_over_planned}
